content.rendered:
We have won the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 award for the fastest-growing young company in Central Europe and we are looking for new colleagues who will help us move our project forward! Take advantage of the opportunity and become a part of the fast-growing startup FTMO.com. We are looking for a new colleague in the web team.

What will be your agenda?

  • Website development and maintenance.
  • Customization of existing templates and the creation of new ones according to requirements.
  • Integration of plugins and tools to enhance website functionality and performance.
  • It will be an advantage if you are familiar with and proficient in the ACF | Advanced Custom Fields plugin for WordPress.
  • Website optimization for speed and SEO.
  • Debugging and error fixing in the code.
  • Collaboration with designers, content creators, and other team members.
  • Monitoring new trends in the WordPress world and implementing the latest practices.

What are we expecting from you?

  • Minimum of 2 years of experience in WordPress website and e-commerce development and management.
  • Strong expertise in technologies for creating responsive and appealing web designs.
  • Development of custom plugins and modifications to existing templates as per project requirements.
  • Advanced PHP knowledge for custom development and feature modifications + interest in learning React technology.
  • Basic understanding of SEO principles and the ability to implement basic SEO optimizations.
  • Ability to work independently, efficiently solve problems, and meet established deadlines.
  • Capability to introduce new ideas and innovative solutions for enhancing web projects.

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 150+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals.
  • We encourage self-realisation, we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on ourselves and move professionally forward.
  • Thanks our working pace, we can assure you that you won’t get bored with us.
  • We will train you on financial markets and all the other related topics so you know our business.
  • Working from home is not a problem (it always depends on the agreement), but we prefer to work in the office – Quadrio offices will make you feel like at home as well.
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office.
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club!
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices.
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us.

Did we catch your attention? Let us know!
Send us ➡️ your CV or LinkedIn profile and we’ll gladly meet you, regardless whether in person or online.
